section.name: About patterntesting-exception
section.p: If you want to do exception handling correct this is a hard job. PatternTesting-Exception wants to help you to do this job. For this reason this AspectJ library provides:

ul.li: better exception handling (it wraps some common exception like IOException and replaces the error message by a more helpful one, e.g. which file is missing with a FileNotFoundException).)
Test support for exception handling (via ExceptionFactory and @TestException annotation)

section.name: History
section.p: In a previous version the exception support was distributed over several sub projects (patterntesting-rt and patterntesting-check).
